### What is this?

A complete landing page template to launch a new project or idea (frontend only). Uses the latest frontend technologies and best practices to unblock you and delight your customers.

### Who is this for?

You are an indiehacker, bootstrapper, YC startup, solopreneur, VC-backed startup, developer, or student. You are thinking about launching a new idea or already have a prototype. Maybe it's an AI SaaS, a crazy drone robot company, or just a simple digital product. But... you dread the idea of learning react or anything frontend ðŸ˜©

**This template is exactly what you're looking for.**
